content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-15, -50)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore (position -15, -50)
- Wooden chest collecting iron ore (position -14.5, -48.5)
- Stone furnace for smelting iron (position -14, -47)

### Iron Plate Production Line (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace smelting iron ore (position 0, 0)
- Stone furnace smelting iron ore (position 4, 4)
- Stone furnace smelting iron ore (position 6, 4)

### Copper Production Line
Consists of:
- Stone furnace smelting copper ore (position 2, 0)

### Automation Science Pack Factory (24.5, 4.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 (position 24.5, 4.5)
- Input chest with copper plates and iron gear wheels (position 21.5, 4.5)
- Output chest collecting products (position 27.5, 4.5)
- Two burner inserters:
  - One moving items from input chest (position 22.5, 4.5)
  - One moving items to output chest (position 26.5, 4.5)
- Electric poles powering the assembly line (positions 22.5, 6.5 and 24.5, 6.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position 9.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -2.0, 23.5)
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipe networks for water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting to machinery

### Research Lab
Lab present with automation science packs loaded (position not specified)

# ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check if target position is clear before placing entities
- Remove existing entities at target position before placing new ones
- Ensure there is enough space around target position for entity placement

### Power Connection Issues
- Steam engine shows "NOT_CONNECTED" status - ensure proper power pole connections
- Lab shows "NO_POWER" status - verify electrical network connectivity

### Fuel Management
- Boiler frequently shows "NO_FUEL" status - implement better coal supply management
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to fuel machines
- Consider setting up automated coal delivery system

### Resource Management
- Multiple "NO_INGREDIENTS" warnings - implement better resource supply chains
- Monitor and maintain consistent material flow between processes

### Inventory Issues
- Several crafting failures due to missing materials
- Ensure required materials are available before attempting crafting operations
- Keep track of intermediate products needed for crafting chains

### Machine Blockage
- Inserters showing "output blocked" warnings
- Ensure proper item flow and storage capacity in output containers
- Monitor and clear blocked paths regularly
